message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will bring you value and satisfaction. I'm willing to start with a price of $18,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! However, $18,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $10,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.

I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. This is a fair price considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $14,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is my final offer, let me know what you think.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $13,000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a little higher than I'd like to be.  I'm willing to offer $11,500.  I'm hoping we can find a compromise here.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $12,500, but I'm not going any lower. This is my last concession, and I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
Alice,  I understand you're at your limit, but I'm still hoping to find a middle ground.  I'm willing to offer $12,000.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement on this final offer.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob! I'll meet you at $12,250, but I'm not going any higher. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings. What do you think?
